about_the_game:
Game background:
It’s another day today... You are a waste of wood, and you are swallowed by the vending machine. The unlucky things always happen at the same time.
"Hey, are you okay?"
A locomotive stopped in front of you. She took off her helmet and looked pretty. She looked at you worriedly and handed you a tissue.
Since then, Shuangyan has maintained a long-term sexual relationship with you, and she secretly laughs whenever she recalls the first encounter. After all, you also have something to hide from her...
Non-romance works, there are a small number of female characters insulting, female characters are superior to the training plot, and the male characters will grow up, not just nerds, there are anti-training plots.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

short_description: Hot And Lovely: Violet is a find-the-differences mini-game. By clicking on the picture area with the mouse to select the difference between the left and right pictures, you can unlock the hot CG with the motorcycle girl!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
